Docs.summary: Represents an attribute that is applied to the class definition and determines the s of the properties that are of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Control authors apply this attribute to the class definition to specify the s of the properties that are of type . For example, if you look at the declaration of the class, this attribute is used to specify that the of the property is . Subclasses inherit this definition but can redefine the of the property by using this attribute on its own class definition. ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this class or its properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
